dev:remarks.maml:para: $Params = @{ Computername = $Computername WebSession = New-UMSAPICookie -Computername $Computername DIRID = 49289 -Name Name = 'NewDirName' } Update-UMSProfileName @Params Update-UMSThinclientDirectoryName -Computername 'UMSSERVER' -WebSession $WebSession Updates thinclient directory name to 'NewDirName'
Updates thinclient directory name to 'NewDirName'
